page.title: 09LOCAL NEWS
page.content: From{May to September}the{luxury train touring{Scotland}is making an overnight stop at{Ladybank.}The holiday costing{Â£1,600}for{six days attracts mainly{American tourists. Two of the{road junctions}in Ladybank are being closed for{safety reasons thus {restricting access.}There is going to be a{fund raising Church Fete involving{4 churches, Ladybank, {Collessie, Cults and Kingskettle.}The railway line from{Ladybank to Perth has been{reopened}and{passengers can {now travel to Inverness.}The{Malt {Barns}are{possibly}being purchased by the{Council as the}owner{cannot}be {contacted.}The building has been vacant for{approx. 20 years}and is in a{very dangerous state due to {vandalism.}They hope to convert it into{sheltered housing.
